data.name: Fantasy Grounds - Mini-Dungeon #020: Sepulchre of the Witching Hour's Sage (PFRPG)
data.detailed_description:
For 4 Characters of Level 5


There have always been those who would stop at nothing to gain answers to their questions. Does your party dare to meet such a man whom even history cannot forget? And are you willing to pay the price for the answers you seek? The characters may be actively seeking the Sage for their own personal benefit or on behalf of an NPC, or he could hold the answer to a burning question in your campaign.

Mini-Dungeons are small adventures for Pathfinder which are setting agnostic and are easily inserted anywhere in your campaign.

Released on January 27, 2017. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.2.2 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and the included Pathfinder Ruleset.

pc_requirements.minimum:
最低:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • プロセッサー: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • メモリー: 1 GB RAM
  • グラフィック: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • ネットワーク: ブロードバンドインターネット接続
  • ストレージ: 500 MB 利用可能
  • サウンドカード: N/A
  • 追記事項: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
推奨:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • プロセッサー: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • メモリー: 4 GB RAM
  • グラフィック: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • ネットワーク: ブロードバンドインターネット接続
  • ストレージ: 2 GB 利用可能
  • サウンドカード: N/A
  • 追記事項: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
